eg.document

Class TypingEdit

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.document.TypingEdit

  • public class TypingEdit
extends java.lang.Object
    Mediates between the editing of the text document and the actions that happen in response. Actions include syntax coloring, indentation, line numbering, reading the current line and columns and adding edits to the undoable edits.

    Created in FileDocument
